name: Cursor Custodian
description:
Note: Due to the way emscripten handles SDL_ttf, the jam build of this game is unexpectedly broken. Obviously you should only take the jam build into consideration when rating this entry, but you can download a working build of the game here and the web version will be fixed after the rating period.

You're a deadly but caring cursor in Cursor Custodian, a game made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Jam using C++ and SDL2! 

  • Moving the cursor near the player will cause him to move in the opposite direction. 
  • Clicking the left mouse button near the player will cause him to jump.
  • Guide the player away from holes, but don't get too close— he'll die on collision with the cursor! Keep the player alive as long as possible to get the best score.
